text.description: The text in which all artifacts are extracted from. Text is stored under the value of 'sofaString'.

sentence.description: The start and stop index of a sentence in the document.

newline.description: The index of a newlines in the document.

word.description: The index of a word in the document.

punctuation.description: The index of punctuation in the document.

number.description: The index of punctuation in the document.

symbol.description: The index of a symbol in the document.

chunk.description: The index of a chunk in the document.

dependant.description: The index of a dependancy node in the document.

predicate.description: The index of a predicate in the document.

numeral.description: The index of a mentioned Roman numeral in the document.

measurement.description: The index of a mentioned measurement in the document.

fraction.description: The index of a mentioned fraction in the document.

medication.description: The index of a mentioned medication in the document.

disease.description: The index of a mentioned disease or disorder in the document.

symptom.description: The index of a mentioned symptom or sign in the document.

procedure.description: The index of a mentioned procedure in the document.

anatomy.description: The index of a mentioned anatomical site in the document.

argument.description: The index of a semantic argument in the document.

relation.description: The index of a semantic role in the document.

umls.description: A reference to an UMLS concept.
